episodes.title: Escaping FLDS and Turning Pain into Purpose | Thomas Dockstader on The Jimmy Rex Show
episodes.description: I sit down with Jimmy Rex to share the unfiltered story of running away from the FLDS community at 18, battling addiction, and rebuilding my life through sobriety, inner work, and a powerful Ayahuasca breakthrough. We dive into how those experiences sparked my mission—the Chi Codes—to guide others toward healing and purpose. If you’ve ever felt trapped by your past, this conversation proves transformation is possible. Watch, reflect, and let me know what resonates with you in the comments.

episodes.title: 11. Rising Through Resilience: Kandi Bateman’s Journey from FLDS Life to Cancer Survivor
episodes.description: Episode 11, I sit down with Kandi Bateman as she opens up about her incredible life journey. Growing up within the FLDS, Kandi’s world was shaped by the teachings of a deeply restrictive religion and life in a polygamist marriage. But her story doesn’t end there. In a gripping conversation, Kandi shares how she faced an even greater battle—cancer—and how it challenged her faith, courage, and resilience. Join us as we explore her path through the hardships of indoctrination, health struggles, and her powerful journey toward personal freedom and self-empowerment.

episodes.title: Rebuilding Belief: My Journey from Cult Indoctrination to Spiritual Freedom
episodes.description: Episode 10:  I take you through my personal transformation—how I went from being deeply indoctrinated in a religious cult to breaking away from those beliefs and rebuilding my life. After leaving the FLDS at 18, I was lost, struggling to find a belief system that resonated with me. This episode explores how I shed old patterns, overcame personal struggles, and found spiritual clarity. Join me as I share the insights and practices that helped me redefine my path to true freedom and self-discovery.

episodes.title: From Cult Life to Courage: Deborah Dockstader’s Unbreakable Spirit
episodes.description: Episode 9: In this deeply personal and emotional episode of The Chi Codes, I sit down with my mother, Deborah Dockstader, to share her extraordinary life story. From a challenging childhood to marrying my father and joining the FLDS cult, Deborah’s journey is one of relentless perseverance. Over the years, she raised nine children while navigating the heartache of my father taking a second wife—her own sister—and later, the grief of losing him at the early age of 53. Her strength has been tested time and again, including watching her children struggle with addiction, and one son’s 20-year incarceration. Now facing the final chapter of her life with liver failure, Deborah remains a symbol of unwavering resilience, never giving up despite the many obstacles she faced. This episode delves into her experiences, the lessons she’s learned, and how she continues to inspire those around her. Tune in for an intimate conversation about love, loss, and the enduring power of the human spirit.

episodes.title: 05. From FLDS to Freedom: Doyle Dockstader’s 20 Years in Prison and His Path to Redemption (Part 2)
episodes.description: In the second part of our two-part series on The Chi Codes, we continue the conversation with my older brother, Doyle Dockstader, as he delves deeper into his extraordinary journey. After 20 years in prison, Doyle reflects on the lessons learned, the battles fought, and the internal work required to rebuild his life. From facing the ghosts of his past to finding a new purpose, Doyle shares how he turned his life around and the pivotal steps that led him to freedom—both physically and spiritually. This episode is a testament to the resilience of the human spirit and a powerful reminder that it’s never too late to change. Don’t miss the conclusion of Doyle’s inspiring story

episodes.title: 03. From FLDS to Freedom: Doyle Dockstader’s 20 Years in Prison and His Path to Redemption (Part 1)
episodes.description: In this gripping first part of a two-part series on The Chi Codes, I sit down with my older brother, Doyle Dockstader, to uncover his extraordinary journey. Raised within the strict confines of the FLDS church and later spending 20 years behind bars, Doyle’s life seemed destined for darkness. But against all odds, he transformed his life, and now he’s here to share his powerful story. Join us as Doyle opens up about his time in prison, the pivotal moments that sparked his change, and how he’s dedicated to inspiring others who are struggling to find their way. This is a story of redemption, resilience, and the power of the human spirit. Don’t miss Part 1 of this incredible tale.

episodes.title: Leaving the FLDS Church
episodes.description: Leaving the FLDS was a monumental turning point in my life. In this video, I share my personal journey of breaking free from the constraints of a religious community and discovering a new belief system that resonates with me. If you're struggling with your own beliefs or are curious about life after leaving a religious community, this video is for you. #FLDS #LeavingReligion #SpiritualJourney #PersonalTransformation #NewBeliefs #Freedom #SelfDiscovery
